messages.message:
It says here that "Converse doesn't remember your previous questions. Give full context in each question." but docs release notes (https://docs.instabase.com/release-notes#conversations--chatbots-12) say "All models support conversation memory across prompts in conversations and chatbots. Your previous three queries and their responses are used as context for subsequent queries."

We should update this message

It also isn’t called Converse anymore. I suggest replacing that whole line with:

“Conversations remember your previous three questions and responses for context.”
